mapper.sql: maritalEmployID, maritalAgencyID, maritalEmploySex, maritalEmployAge, maritalEmployName, maritalEmployNick, maritalEmployPhone,maritalEmployQQ,maritalEmployWeixin, maritalEmployImage,maritalEmployEvaluation,sort, isCurrent,isDelete,theNode
mapper.select: select a.maritalEmployID, a.maritalAgencyID, a.maritalEmploySex, a.maritalEmployAge, a.maritalEmployName, a.maritalEmployNick, a.maritalEmployPhone, a.maritalEmployQQ, a.maritalEmployWeixin, a.maritalEmployImage, a.maritalEmployEvaluation, a.sort, a.isCurrent, a.isDelete, a.theNode, b.maritalAgencyName, b.maritalAgencyLogo, b.maritalAgencyPhone, b.maritalAgencyDetail, b.provinceID, b.provinceName, b.cityID, b.cityName, b.countyID, b.countyName, b.townID, b.townName, b.areaName from solove_maritalEmploy a inner join solove_maritalAgency b on a.maritalAgencyID = b.maritalAgencyID where a.maritalEmployID = #{maritalEmployID, jdbcType=INTEGER}
